document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc said on thursday that it would start selling amazon.com inc's kindle this week, as amazon continues to bring the electronic reader into more shops to attract potential buyers.
document.title: amazon's kindle to be sold at 3,100 walmart stores
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc said on thursday that it would start selling amazon.com inc's kindle this week, as amazon continues to bring the electronic reader into more shops to attract potential buyers.
